title: OXO Dustpan & Brush Set
description: The OXO Good Grips Dust Pan & Brush Set is the perfect cleaning companion, whether you're getting rid of a mess or just tidying up. The whisk-broom shape makes it easy to sweep from above. The rubber lip along the front edge of the Dust Pan conforms to surfaces, making sure every last bit is swept up. The Brush features a soft, non-slip handle for a comfortable grip while you clean up that spilled sugar or gather those dust bunnies. Snap the Brush into the durable Dust Pan for convenient storage.

The OXO Good Grips Dust Pan & Brush Set is the perfect cleaning companion, whether you're getting rid of a mess or just tidying up. The whisk-broom shape makes it easy to sweep from above. The rubber lip along the front edge of the Dust Pan conforms to surfaces, making sure every last bit is swept up. The Brush features a soft, non-slip handle for a comfortable grip while you clean up that spilled sugar or gather those dust bunnies. Snap the Brush into the durable Dust Pan for convenient storage.

transcripts: Have you ever dropped down a handful of Cherios or knocked over a potted plant? OXO's dustpan and brush allow you to pick up life's spills with ease without pulling out a giant broom or dustpan. The OXO brush pan and dust set features a whisk broom that makes it easy to sweep from above. The rubber lip along the front edge of the dust pan conforms to the surfaces making sure every last bit is swept up. the brush features a soft non-slip handle for a comfortable grip while you clean up that spilled sugar or gather those dust bunnies.  Snap the brush into the durable dust pan fro convenient storage and it also features a hanging hole. Here's a tip, the OXO dustpan and brush set is great all over your home. try it in your garage, workshop , car, and more.
